q: trucks. The announcement was made at the EPA laboratories in Ann Arbor, Mich., following a meeting with Sergio Marchionne , Chrysler Group CEO, and Lisa P. Jackson , Agency Administrator for the EPA. In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the U.S. economy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers- especially if their dollars stay in America, Sergio Marchionne said. "Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track.

DC- In a surprise shakeup, Google co-founder Larry Page is replacing Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the search giant. Starting April 4, Page will take over day-to-day operations while Eric Schmidt becomes executive chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. Shortly after the announcement was posted on the company's blog, Eric Schmidt tweeted "Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!" in reference to his much-discussed role as a moderating check to Page

. Sharing an analysis held by Tory thinkers Oliver Letwin and Michael Gove , he said:" Tony Blair as good as admits that he wasted his first term flogging the horse of centralised control. He only came later to real modernisation with an agenda that promoted choice and competition. "Reading his intriguing memoir over the summer, I was struck by how many times he himself admits that opportunities were lost and Labour should have "pushed further and faster on reform". He said Tony Blair had been held back by Gordon Brown , a sceptical Whitehall machine and entrenched union interests.
